question: What is Bank Rate?
option1: Rate at which RBI lends to people
option2: Rate at which bank lends to people
option3: Rate at which RBI lends to banks
option4: Rate at which RBI lends to Financial Institutions
answer: Rate at which RBI lends to banks
explanation: Bank Rate is the rate at which RBI lends to commercial banks. It is tool to manage money supply in the market. Currently it is not in use.
